thread.title: Color this page from ‘Darth Vader and Family’ coloring book — exclusive
thread.title_full: Color this page from ‘Darth Vader and Family’ coloring book — exclusive

author: Isabella Biedenharn
title: Color this page from ‘Darth Vader and Family’ coloring book — exclusive
text:
Email 
You’ve watched countless hours of Star Wars — but haven’t you ever wanted to color in some scenes from Darth Vader’s family life that, er, didn’t quite make it into the films? In Jeffrey Brown’s Darth Vader and Family Coloring Book , you can bring these adorable images — most of which first appeared in Brown’s delightful Darth Vader and Son series — to technicolor life. The coloring book features 47 black-and-white images from the series and nine brand new color-able scenes. 
Below, check out EW’s exclusive Darth Vader and Family coloring page, where Vader’s cape gets put to good use by little Luke and little Leia. Darth Vader and Family Coloring Book hits shelves March 28. Show Full Article
